body:
Hi Taizo,



I am not sure if you can simply convert data from one format to another. The values that are found in Window 7.4 correspond to measurements made through a photogoniometer: [http://www.pab.eu/gonio-photometer/](http://www.pab.eu/gonio-photometer/)



The values that you saw in the image are radiation values from the BSDF file. The file that you uploaded actually is already in compatible format.
